title: Tooltip
description: A UI component that appears to provide additional information when users trigger specific elements.

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: Tooltips include brief explanations or guidance to help users understand. They are mainly used for concise information and intuitively show direction with arrows.

variants.title: Variants
variants.description: Tooltip supports two visual variants: default and info

customContent.title: Custom Content
customContent.description: You can pass text or any JSX structure through the content prop. Customize with inline styles or custom markup as you wish.

controlled.title: Controlled Visibility
controlled.description: Use the isVisible prop to control tooltip visibility externally. When true, the tooltip is always visible without hover. When false, hover is disabled.

props.title: Props
props.children: Trigger element that shows tooltip on hover
props.content: Tooltip content to display (text or JSX element, fully customizable)
props.variant: Visual variant of tooltip (default or info)
props.position: Direction that the arrow points to
props.offset: Distance from trigger element in pixels
props.isVisible: Control visibility externally (true: always visible, false: disabled, undefined: hover controlled)
